daysOfWeek.description: Identifies the day(s) of the week. If absent, it indicates every day of the week.

items.description: integer between and including 1 and 7 denoting a weekday. 1 shall indicate Monday, and the subsequent weekdays shall be indicated with the next higher numbers. 7 shall indicate Sunday.

timeOfDayEnd.description: String with format partial-time or full-time as defined in clause 5.6 of IETF RFC 3339. Examples, 20:15:00, 20:15:00-08:00 (for 8 hours behind UTC).

timeOfDayStart.description: String with format partial-time or full-time as defined in clause 5.6 of IETF RFC 3339. Examples, 20:15:00, 20:15:00-08:00 (for 8 hours behind UTC).
